events.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18
events.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979  and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal  as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

events.title: Espanyol vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
events.desc: Espanyol have not won any of their last 28 LaLiga games against Barcelona. Only two teams have gone 29 or more consecutive matches without a win against the same opponent in the competition's history: Real Sociedad against Real Madrid between 1957 and 1979  and Hércules also against Real Madrid between 1940 and 1984. FC Barcelona are unbeaten in their last 16 away LaLiga games against Espanyol, since a 3-1 defeat in January 2007 at the Lluís Companys. This run is only surpassed by Villarreal  as their longest away unbeaten streak against the same opponent in the competition's history.

events.title: Real Madrid vs Real Betis - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 18 - Mini Match
events.desc: Real Madrid lost their last La Liga game against Real Betis, 2-1 in March 2025, after having been unbeaten in their previous nine encounters. They have not lost two consecutive league games against Real Betis since 1999. Real Madrid have won just two of their last eight home games against Real Betis, failing to score in six of those matches – they have failed to score in six home games against the Verdiblancos in LaLiga since the 2017/18 season, at least two more than against any other opponent.
